description.value:
You know that you are far better than average creatures of your kind. The more you leverage your psychic talents to prove yourself superior, the more powerful you become.

Phrenic Pool Ability: Charisma

Bonus Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6ux76jy9wbi88br0]{Moment of Greatness} (1st),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.wrh3m8ad4l8sbisc]{Deflect Blame} (4th),
  • unflappable mien (6th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.qy6sn5a4wrsa36yb]{Majestic Image} (8th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9v2s3xjlakjm1eq1]{Mage's Private Sanctum} (10th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9pbl3ktd5oqejl19]{Transformation} (12th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.0w3hvcp3gb2bhtv5]{Project Image} (14th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9968j68bl9x9iq7u]{Clone} (self only) (16th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xuuzj9lr2xbwaim4]{Overwhelming Presence} (18th).
